title: Uncertainty

mean.description: The arithmetic mean (used for normal distributions).

meanFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the arithmetic mean.

geomMean.description: The geometric mean value (used for log-normal distributions).

geomMeanFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the geometric mean.

minimum.description: The minimum value (used for uniform and triangle distributions).

minimumFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the minimum value.

sd.description: The arithmetic standard deviation  (used for normal distributions).

sdFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the arithmetic standard deviation.

geomSd.description: The geometric standard deviation (used for log-normal distributions).

geomSdFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the geometric standard deviation.

mode.description: The most likely value (used for triangle distributions).

modeFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the most likely value.

maximum.description: The maximum value (used for uniform and triangle distributions).

maximumFormula.description: A mathematical formula for the maximum value.

description: Defines the parameter values of an uncertainty distribution. Depending on the uncertainty distribution type different parameters could be used.
